metadata.title: CVE-2021-47028 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: mt76:mt7915: fix txrate reporting Properly check rate_info to fix unexpectedreporting. [ 1215.161863] Call trace: [ 1215.164307]cfg80211_calculate_bitrate+0x124/0x200 [cfg80211] [ 1215.170139]ieee80211s_update_metric+0x80/0xc0 [mac80211] [ 1215.175624]ieee80211_tx_status_ext+0x508/0x838 [mac80211] [ 1215.181190]mt7915_mcu_get_rx_rate+0x28c/0x8d0 [mt7915e] [ 1215.186580]mt7915_mac_tx_free+0x324/0x7c0 [mt7915e] [ 1215.191623]mt7915_queue_rx_skb+0xa8/0xd0 [mt7915e] [ 1215.196582]mt76_dma_cleanup+0x7b0/0x11d0 [mt76] [ 1215.201276] __napi_poll+0x38/0xf8 [1215.204668] napi_workfn+0x40/0x80 [ 1215.208062]process_one_work+0x1fc/0x390 [ 1215.212062] worker_thread+0x48/0x4d0 [1215.215715] kthread+0x120/0x128 [ 1215.218935] ret_from_fork+0x10/0x1c

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-47028` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
